name: Bookmaster: Rise Of The Holy Sanctuary
name_original: Bookmaster: Rise Of The Holy Sanctuary
description:
Bookmaster : Rise Of The Hoiy Sanctuary

The 7th Entry Of The Bookmaster Series

Date: December 7th 2021

- Set In Elysian

- Plot Synopsis -

The story is about an girl name Rita and her job is to be an priestess of her Sanctuary called Holy Saint, An place that was founded by her father when he was in his youth.

Rita was worries to be the next leader due to her shy personality to lead an powerful Sanctuary but still getting mentor by priestess of Sisterhood and her father to be an leader.

Rita believe that there is an spirit that goes to capture her due to being the weaker vessel to be possessed.

She goes out and explore the whole Sanctuary to find out the mystery of this strange spirit.

Now Rita had to lead the Sanctuary to find out what is going on lately and ask the people about this spirit.

"Holyness of an Priestess to shine light into the ritual of Darkness"

- The Control -

Arrow Keys To Move

Z To Jump

X To Summon Your Magic

A  To Heal

Spoilers:  Find out more ablities to find out?

Bookmaster : Rise Of The Holy Sanctuary is available at Gamejolt.com

https://gamejolt.com/games/Bookmaster_Rise_Of_The_Holy_Sanctuary/590053
